sentence: Why did the blonde girl get fired from the m&m factory? she kept throwing away all the ws.
explanation: In the context of the joke, w refers to the letter that was discarded. In another context, it can refer to a win (i.e., W).
first_new_sentence: The book discussed the significance of the letter W in the English language.
second_new_sentence: The team celebrated their success with a W in the championship game.

sentence: Whats the difference between sand and period blood? i cant gargle with sand.
